movies.title: Gantz revolution
movies.plot: Kato's (Ken'ichi Matsuyama) death changes Kurono's (Kazunari Ninomiya) view of life completely. He decides to keep fighting until he earns 100 points so that he can bring back Kato. GANTZ calls back several other unwilling participants that were allowed to leave after scoring 100 points. Before Kurono succeeds in resurrecting Kato, he unexpectedly comes back. GANTZ and the fighters take on another enemy worse than ever before. To make matters worse, GANTZ starts acting up. GANTZ chooses the next target... this time it's not an alien but a human girl. Each unwilling participant in GANTZ's twisted game has a different motive for fighting, whether to protect a loved one or to do what they think is right.
movies.simplePlot: Kato's (Ken'ichi Matsuyama) death changes Kurono's (Kazunari Ninomiya) view of life completely. He decides to keep fighting until he earns 100 points so that he can bring back Kato. GANTZ ...

biography.bio: Kazunari Ninomiya was born on June 17, 1983 in Tokyo, Japan. He is an actor, known for Letters from Iwo Jima (2006), Tekkonkinkreet (2006) and Gantz (2010).
biography.name: Kazunari Ninomiya

biography.bio: Kenichi Matsuyama was born in Mutsu, Aomori Prefecture. In 2001, Matsuyama started his career modeling and the following year made his debut as an actor landing a small role in the NTV drama "Gokusen". In 2003, Matsuyama made his film debut in a supporting role in "Bright Future". His major breakthrough was in 2006 with Matsuyama's performance as "L" in the Death Note film franchise. Subsequently, he was nominated for several awards, winning in 2006 the Hochi Film Awards for Best New Actor and in 2007 the Japan Academy Award for Best New Actor and Yokohama Film Festival Award for Best New Talent. Since then Kenichi has performed in a variety of different character driven roles. As of 2010 Kenichi Matsuyama won the Takasaki Film Festival award for Best Actor and 64th Mainichi Film Awards for Best Actor. He is with Horipro Talent Agency.
biography.name: Ken'ichi Matsuyama

biography.bio: Yuriko Yoshitaka was born on July 22, 1988 in Tokyo, Japan. She is an actress, known for Noriko's Dinner Table (2005), A Story of Yonosuke (2013) and Gantz (2010).
biography.name: Yuriko Yoshitaka

biography.bio: Ayumi Ito was active as a child model. In 1993, she made her film debut in Mizu no tabibito: Samurai kizzu (1993). Her distinctive style then led to her superb acting in the 1996 feature, Swallowtail Butterfly (1996). She received a Best New Actress Award and Best Supporting Actress Award from the Japanese Academy Awards for this role. She also received the Best New Actress Award from the Takasaki Film Festival.
biography.name: Ayumi Itô

biography.bio: Kanata Hongô was born on November 15, 1990 in Miyagi, Japan. He is an actor, known for Gantz (2010), Attack on Titan: Part 1 (2015) and Hinokio: Inter Galactic Love (2005).
biography.name: Kanata Hongô

biography.bio: Kensuke Chisaka is an actor, known for Gantz (2010), Gantz revolution (2011) and Inugoe (2006).
biography.name: Kensuke Chisaka

biography.bio: Gô Ayano is an actor, known for The Light Shines Only There (2014), 64: Part I (2016) and The Snow White Murder Case (2014).
biography.name: Gô Ayano

biography.bio: Shigeru Oxe is an actor, known for Gantz revolution (2011), The Kirishima Thing (2012) and ABCs of Death 2 (2014).
biography.name: Shigeru Oxe

biography.bio: Yasuyuki Hirano is an actor, known for Gantz revolution (2011), Hajimete no himitsu (2004) and Ringu 0 (2000).
biography.name: Yasuyuki Hirano

biography.bio: Masafumi Oishi is known for his work on Gantz revolution (2011), Tekken: Blood Vengeance (2011) and Edo of the Dead (2012).
biography.name: Masafumi Oishi

biography.bio: Kyoji Kamui is an actor, known for Gantz revolution (2011), Kamen Rider J (1994) and The Eel (1997).
biography.name: Kyoji Kamui

biography.bio: Masanobu Sakata is an actor, known for Gantz revolution (2011), Nami no kazu dake dakishimete (1991) and Kasa wo Motanai Aritachi wa (2016).
biography.name: Masanobu Sakata

biography.bio: Naho Toda was born on March 13, 1974 in Hiroshima, Japan. She is an actress, known for Shomuni (1998), Police Dog Dream (2010) and The Friends (1994).
biography.name: Naho Toda

biography.bio: Ryûya Wakaba is an actor, known for Gantz (2010), Gantz revolution (2011) and Yoshiwara Uradôshin (2014).
biography.name: Ryûya Wakaba

biography.bio: Japanese actor, born on 20th October 1983, teen heartthrob Yamada Takayuki, first started out co-starring in a handful of Jdoramas before making a big splash on Waterboys (2003). He followed with Fireboys (2004), his award winning performance in Crying Out Love, in the Center of the World (2004), Churasan 3 and the recent H2 (2005). His remarkable acting makes him most outstanding among the younger generation of Japanese actors.
biography.name: Takayuki Yamada
